mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, num, title, content, writer, regidate, category, price, dcrate, mancount, womancount, totalage, profit, sellcharge, viewcnt, filepath, gamefilepath, status from (select * from (select * from gamedetail where category like #{category} ) order by num desc)) where rnum between #{startNum} and #{endNum}
select count(num) from gamedetail where category like #{category}
select count(*) from gamereview where gdnum = #{num}
select * from gamedetail where num = #{num}
select filename from gamedetailfile where gdnum = #{num} order by num
select * from gamedetaildc where gdnum=#{num} and joinclick <= goal and sysdate < dcenddate and rownum=1 order by dcstartdate
mapper.update: update gamedetaildc set joinclick=joinclick+1 where num=#{num}
update gamedetail set title=#{title}, price=#{price}, category=#{category}, content=#{content}, dcrate=#{dcrate}, gamefilepath=#{gamefilepath}, filepath=#{filepath} where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, num, gdnum, writer, content, regidate, updatedate, recommend, assistyes, assistno from (select * from gamereview where gdnum = #{num} order by regidate desc)) where rnum between #{startNum} and #{endNum}
select * from (select * from gamereview where gdnum=#{num} and recommend='추천' order by assistyes desc) where rownum=1
select * from (select * from gamereview where gdnum=#{num} and recommend='비추천' order by assistyes desc) where rownum=1
mapper.insert: insert into gamereview (num, gdnum, writer, content, recommend) values((select nvl2(max(num), max(num)+1, 1) from gamereview), #{gdnum}, #{id}, #{reviewContent}, #{likeselect})
mapper.select: select * from gamereview where num = #{num}
mapper.update: update gamereview set content=#{content}, updatedate=sysdate where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select * from (select * from gamedetaildc where gdnum=#{num} order by dcenddate) where rownum between 1 and 5 order by dcenddate
mapper.insert: insert into gamedetaildc values((select nvl2(max(num), max(num)+1, 1) from gamedetaildc), #{gdnum}, #{dcrate}, #{joinclick}, #{goal}, #{rqstartdate}, #{rqenddate}, #{dcstartdate}, #{dcenddate})
mapper.update: update gamedetail set status=#{status} where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select count(*) from gamedetaildcjoiner where dcnum=#{num} and id=#{id}
select count(*) from buylist where id=#{id} and gdnum=#{num}
select count(*) from buylist,userinfo where buylist.id=userinfo.id and buylist.gdnum=#{num} and userinfo.sex='남자'
select count(*) from buylist,userinfo where buylist.id=userinfo.id and buylist.gdnum=#{num} and userinfo.sex='여자'
select f.num, f.filename from gamedetailfile f, gamedetail g where f.gdnum=g.num and f.gdnum=#{num} order by f.num asc
mapper.update: update gamedetailfile set filename = #{filename} where num = #{num}
